abstract: Vows column on wedding of Cristen Conger and Christopher Ahnberg.

headline.print_headline: A Feminist Romance, but Not a Radical One
headline.main: A Feminist Romance, but Not a Radical One

snippet: Both bride and groom are thoroughly modern on women’s rights. But parts of their love affair had an old-timey flair.
lead_paragraph: Both bride and groom are thoroughly modern on women’s rights. But parts of their love affair had an old-timey flair.
